name: Christine's Bacon and Brussels Sprout Cranberry Salad
author: Christine Folkes
summary: Wonderful quick and healthy warm salad that can be prepared in advance.
ingredients: ½ pound thick-cut bacon, cut into 1-inch chunks
1 pound Brussels sprouts, cut into 1/4-inch slices
¼ cup chopped, unsalted, and roasted almonds
¼ cup balsamic vinaigrette dressing, or to taste
directions: Place bacon in a wok or large skillet; cook and stir until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Mix Brussels sprouts, cranberries, apple, water, and almonds into bacon; cook and stir over medium-high heat until Brussels sprouts are bright green and tender, 7 to 10 minutes
Transfer sprouts mixture to a bowl and top with dressing
